plot: Walking through the park one bitterly cold day, a woman is with her son and notices her old school teacher petrified on a bench. Try as she might, she cannot wake him, until the mystery takes hold of her.
title: A pad
plot_es: Walking through the park one bitterly cold day, a woman is with her son and notices her old school teacher petrified on a bench. Try as she might, she cannot wake him, until the mystery takes hold of her.
plot_en: Walking through the park one bitterly cold day, a woman is with her son and notices her old school teacher petrified on a bench. Try as she might, she cannot wake him, until the mystery takes hold of her.
